tweet: You do not need to buy a whole Bitcoin. You can have any portion of a Bitcoin, 0.005 BTC, for example.  There are *many* newcomers who do not realize this, and they stay out of the market, or buy an alt, purely because they can't afford a whole Bitcoin. #TheMoreYourKnow
